name: campus (Ubuntu 22.04)
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel uv && if command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then uv install -r requirements.txt || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; else python -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; fi
